q_en: What are the cutting tasks for customers who are PolyU?
gt:
Sure! Here are the cutting tasks for the customer "PolyU" that we found:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group Name | Order Product ID |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|------------------|
| 1       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-18 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 1                |
| 4       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-17 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 4                |
| 5       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | Master Sewers      | 5                |
| 2       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | Master Cutters     | 2                |
| 3       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-19 00:00:00 | Master Cutters     | 3                |
| 31      | 2024-05-10 00:00:00 | 2024-05-26 00:00:00 | Master Cutters     | 31               |

These tasks are handled by the talented teams of "Master Sewers" and "Master Cutters". If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! üòÑ

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (1, 9, 13);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the orders associated with the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 31, 35, 36);
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks for the order products associated with the customer "PolyU"
